siteLoader.label: Get Ready to Shake Things Up!

mission.label: Explore each Area of the World Map.
mission.congratulations: Cleared! Explore each Area of the World Map.

treasures.label: TREASURE
treasures.description:
Were you expecting more? You came to the wrong site, pal!
I'm the one who does the stealing around here!

homeSection.speechBubble: To unlock everything on this site you'll have to find the <warioPopupStrong>3 missing treasures</warioPopupStrong> and complete <warioPopupStrong>these missions</warioPopupStrong>. Please mouse-over for details.

storySection.description: This is the story of how I came to be part of this err... story. Basically, I was tricked into helping the Merfles and their Queen Merelda, because there was money involved—lots and lots of money!

character.name: Wario
character.description: Good guy? Not me! You're thinking of that other guy! Its-a-me and all that? I'm much handsomer! And more manly! Way manlier! Really, really manly!

character.name: Queen Merelda
character.description: I guess this Queen Merelda is the queen of those Merfle things, but she doesn’t look like one of them... Oh, well, I hear she’s got treasure, so who cares?

character.name: The Merfles
character.description: The Merfles are little bird guys who went and got themselves captured in big barrel-things. I guess I’ll help them. They know the way out.

character.name: Captain Syrup
character.description: Captain Syrup used to have this habit of trying to steal all my stuff. She seems to be trying to help this time, though, selling me cool adventuring gear. I wish her prices were lower, though...

character.name: Shake King
character.description: The Shake King is supposed to be the big, tough guy here in the Shake Dimension, but anyone can kidnap a queen and take over a whole dimension. I did it twice last week! Really!

character.name: Red Bandineros
character.description: Red Bandineros are all over the place. They're not tough enough to hurt someone as manly as me, so mostly I just shake garlic out of them and throw 'em at stuff.

character.name: Pitchforks
character.description: I call these pointy Bandineros "Pitchforks," because they've got forks on their heads and I like to pitch 'em into walls.

character.name: Yellow Bandineros
character.description: These yellow Bandineros are just like the other ones, but they can jump. Maybe they want to be basketball players?

character.name: Boomdineros
character.description: These big, cannon-looking guys are actually Bandineros wearing cannon-suits that I can shake off. I call 'em Boomdineros. Heh..

character.name: Buccaneros
character.description: Heh. A Bandinero found a sword and wants to be called a Buccanero. Isn't that cute? OUCH! HEY! Cut it out! That thing's sharp!

character.name: Flipstrings
character.description: Flipstings are all pointy, so I can't just jump on them. If I can get 'em to pull into their shells, they're pretty good for throwing, though.

character.name: Spinbats
character.description: Huh. These guys are called Spinbats, but I don't get why. They just fall off the ceiling and...spin at you. Wait, I'm getting an idea!

character.name: Turkeyjerks
character.description: Oh, man, Turkeyjerks. I hate these guys, with all the diving and swooping and stuff. The one good thing about them is when I shake them. That's a good time!

character.name: Bumbleprods
character.description: You know how some guys are pointy on top, so you can't jump on them? Bumbleprods are pointy everywhere. I like to punch the ground before I fight them.

character.name: Nosedozers
character.description: Nosedozers have big drills on their faces. See it? It's right in front of you! Anyway, I can't dash into these guys head-on. I've gotta use strategy and butt-stomp 'em.

character.name: Volcannons
character.description: Volcannons shoot fireballs out of the tops of their heads. Big deal. I do that too when my food is really spicy.

character.name: Scarracudas
character.description: These big fish are called Scarracudas. No, I don't know why! Do I look like a fish-science guy to you?

character.name: Jellopus
character.description: These Jellopus things are always trying to grab my super-cool submarine, the Subwarine (pretty snazzy name, huh?).

character.name: Mummers
character.description: Mummers hang around ancient tombs and haunted houses and stuff. They're pretty tough, but if I shake the ground under 'em, they're no problem.

character.name: Recapitators
character.description: This scary-looking guy is called a Recapitator, 'cuz he keeps throwing his boomerang head and putting it back on. I'll bet he's not so tough with his head off, though. Most guys aren't.

character.name: Crackpots
character.description: You know what the best thing about Crackpots is? I can pick them up and make 'em shoot stuff at other bad guys! Seriously, how many enemies can you say that about?

character.name: Peek-a-booms
character.description: This Peek-a-boom guy is a real pain. He throws bombs at you, and if you throw them back, he just vanishes! How is that fair? I wonder how he'd feel if I did something HE can't do, like shake the ground with my mighty fist?!

character.name: Venus Guytraps
character.description: Venus Guytraps try to eat you after you step on them. I guess that makes sense. I don't like being stepped on, either!

character.name: Shortfuses
character.description: This is a Shortfuse. They always look tense to me, with all the shooting spiky balls and stuff. Maybe they shouldn't drink so much coffee.

character.name: Pengoons
character.description: Pengoons like to hang around in the ice and pop out of their super-secret hiding places to throw ice. I wish I had a super-secret hiding place sometimes.

controls.instructions: Roll over the buttons to learn about them.

dpad.title: +Control Pad
dpad.description: Use this thingamajiggy to move me around.

oneButton.title: 1 Button
oneButton.description: Press the 1 Button and watch me do a Dash Attack! Or if I'm holding a Bad Guy, press it and you can pick the direction that I throw him in. Honestly!

twoButton.title: 2 Button
twoButton.description: Don't press the 2 Button! Every time you push that, I have an uncontrollable urge to jump! You think it's funny, but it gets old fast!

point.title: Earthshake Punch
point.description: If for no good reason you shake the Wii Remote controller, I’m going to get angry and punch the ground as hard as I can. Why? Because sometimes it leads to more treasure—that’s why! And of course, if I’m holding anything with gold in it, SHAKE IT!

point.title: Bar Spin
point.description: I'm not sure why, but if I jump anywhere near a bar, I'll grab on until you tell me to drop. If you shake the Wii Remote controller after that, well of course I'm going to spin! What would you do?

point.title: Unibuckets
point.description: Oh, the Unibucket. While I'm not a huge fan of this uncomfortable contraption, it's a necessary evil to find more loot. So, you can just sit comfortably on your sofa and tilt the Wii Remote controller in the direction you want me to move. Some how, I can still jump... Don't ask.

point.title: My Subwarine
point.description: Now we're talking! My own ship to steal, uh... explore treasures of the ocean with! Watch it when you're steering this thing by tilting the Wii Remote controller—if it takes a hit, so do I!

point.title: Max Fastosity Dasherators
point.description: Laugh at the name, but you'll be squealing for joy when it gets me out of a level in record time, or lets me access treasures and switches I normally couldn't get to. Impressive, right? Yeah, I thought so.

point.title: Blast-O-Cannons
point.description: When inside one of these babies, I can be blasted out at high speed, kind of like when I come flying out of a Max Fastosity Dasherator. Just tilt the Wii Remote in the direction of the nearest gold coin and fire away!

landing.comment: Good, I'm glad you finally clicked here. I always want to win, so it's important you do to. Check out these movies to find out the quickest way to the loot!

video.name: Pick your Battles Video
video.title: Pick your Battles
video.description: First things first, before we get started shaking the treasure, you're going to have to pick a level. Make sure it's not too hard—I wanna win!

video.name: Enter the Scene Video
video.title: Enter the Scene
video.description: Once I'm on the scene, get to it. I want treasure and I want it now! You've got all the time in the world to grab as much treasure as you possibly can, so what are you waiting for?

video.name: Make your Escape Video
video.title: Make your Escape
video.description: Sadly, I've got to find a Merfle Barrel to get all my loot back home. But when I find it, it sets off an alarm! Shake it to set the Merfle free and then follow it as quickly as you can. If you get caught in the level when the time runs out... It's TERRIBLE.

video.name: Spend your Money Video
video.title: Spend your Money
video.description: Wait, what? You're kidding right? This is awful! I've gotta fork over hard stolen money to find new areas? This has gotta be some kinda cruel joke or something. Not funny.
